verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician בִּנְגִינֹ֗ת <WH5058> on Neginoth מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <WH4905> Maschil לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David בְּב֣וֹא <WH935> came הַ֭זִּיפִים <WH2130> when the Ziphims וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and said לְשָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> to Saul הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> not דָ֝וִ֗ד <WH1732> Doth not David מִסְתַּתֵּ֥ר <WH5641> hide עִמָּֽנוּ׃ <WH5973> O אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> me O God בְּשִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> by thy name הוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נִי <WH3467> Save וּבִגְבוּרָתְךָ֥ <WH1369> me by thy strength תְדִינֵֽנִי׃ <WH1777> and judge
אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> O God שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> Hear תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <WH8605> my prayer הַ֝אֲזִ֗ינָה <WH238> give ear לְאִמְרֵי־ <WH561> to the words פִֽי׃ <WH6310> of my mouth

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For זָרִ֨ים ׀ <WH2114> For strangers קָ֤מוּ <WH6965> are risen up עָלַ֗י <WH5921> against וְֽ֭עָרִיצִים <WH6184> against me and oppressors בִּקְשׁ֣וּ <WH1245> seek נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> after my soul לֹ֤א <WH3808> have not שָׂ֨מוּ <WH7760> they have not set אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God לְנֶגְדָּ֣ם <WH5048> before סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> before them Selah
הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> Behold God עֹזֵ֣ר <WH5826> [is] mine helper לִ֑י אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <WH136> the Lord בְּֽסֹמְכֵ֥י <WH5564> [is] with them that uphold נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> my soul
[יָשֹׁוב כ] (יָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> break ק) הָ֭רַע <WH7451> evil לְשֹׁרְרָ֑י <WH8324> unto mine enemies בַּ֝אֲמִתְּךָ֗ <WH571> in thy truth הַצְמִיתֵֽם׃ <WH6789> cut them off

בִּנְדָבָ֥ה <WH5071> I will freely אֶזְבְּחָה־ <WH2076> sacrifice לָּ֑ךְ א֤וֹדֶה <WH3034> unto thee I will praise שִּׁמְךָ֖ <WH8034> thy name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> for [it is] good

כִּ֣י <WH3588> from מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all צָ֭רָה <WH6869> me out of all trouble הִצִּילָ֑נִי <WH5337> For he hath delivered וּ֝בְאֹיְבַ֗י <WH341> [his desire] upon mine enemies רָאֲתָ֥ה <WH7200> hath seen עֵינִֽי׃ <WH5869> and mine eye
